about_the_game: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and some other things too in the full version). Leap through a simulation and into real life while upgrading your abilities as well as defying the laws of physics. We really don't understand how this thing can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do in Project Colored Mountains. Don't be shy! Click that download button to see if the game is right for you.

short_description: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a very big field. Play small parkour challenges, explore a large open world, and figure out what that funny block thing does in Project Colored Mountains.
